item.title: Export a Vroid Avatar to VRChat
item.description: Vroid Studio is a quick & easy 3D character editor which can export to the Unity game engine and from there, integrate into metaverse platforms; in this tutorial we will take our Vroid model and import it into VRChat, a platform for socialising in virtual reality with user-generated worlds.
